TypeSignature.Value: public class TextBox : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl, System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextBox extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl, class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public Class TextBox Inherits WebControl Implements IEditableTextControl, IPostBackDataHandler
public ref class TextBox : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IEditableTextControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 为用户输入显示一个文本框控件。

span.span: Displays a text box control for user input.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 服务器控件是使用户可以输入文本输入的控件。The server control is an input control that lets the user enter text. 默认情况下，的控件属性设置为`TextBoxMode.SingleLine`，它会显示的单行文本框。By default, the property of the control is set to `TextBoxMode.SingleLine`, which displays a single-line text box. 但是，你还可以使用控件来显示多行文本框中或通过更改的值来屏蔽用户输入的文本框属性`TextBoxMode.MultiLine`或`TextBoxMode.Password`分别。However, you can also use the control to display a multiline text box or a text box that masks user input by changing the value of the property to `TextBoxMode.MultiLine` or `TextBoxMode.Password`, respectively. 中显示的文本控件将指定或使用确定属性。The text displayed in the control is specified or determined by using the property. 控件包含可用于控制控件的外观的多个属性。The control contains several properties that allow you to control the appearance of the control. 文本框中，以字符为单位的显示宽度由其属性。The display width of the text box, in characters, is determined by its property. 如果控件是多行文本框中，它显示的行数将由属性。If the control is a multiline text box, the number of rows it displays is determined by the property. 若要显示换行内文本控制、 设置属性`true`。To display text that wraps within the control, set the property to `true`. 你还可以指定如何在输入数据通过设置的几个属性的控件。You can also specify how data is entered in the control by setting a few properties. 若要阻止从正在修改控件中显示的文本，设置属性`true`。To prevent the text displayed in the control from being modified, set the property to `true`. 如果你想要限制对指定数目的字符的用户输入，设置属性。If you want to limit the user input to a specified number of characters, set the property. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来接受用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to accept user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 验证控件可用于在控件中显示输入的文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中验证用户输入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来获取用户输入。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. 当用户单击**添加**显示按钮，在文本框中输入的值的总和。When the user clicks the **Add** button, the sum of the values entered in the text boxes is displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="True" %> TextBox Example

TextBox Example

+ =

``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="vb" AutoEventWireup="false" %> TextBox Example

TextBox Example

+ =

```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |`TagKey`|`HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数动态地添加到页面的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a control to the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 将需要呈现的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的 实例中。

span.span: Adds HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered to the specified instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用要插入的其他属性和样式输出流控件。This method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles to the output stream for a control. 此方法重写 。This method overrides . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法在自定义服务器控件中，以便控件文本始终以粗体显示。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control, so that the control text always appears bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTextBoxAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_textbox_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTextBoxAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_textbox_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTextBoxAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_textbox_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTextBoxAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_textbox_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 重写以便只允许文本控件作为 属性添加。

span.span: Overridden to allow only literal controls to be added as the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终设置分析的对象属性`Text`属性的已分析的对象是否控件，并否则会引发异常。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always sets the property to the parsed object's `Text` property if the parsed object is a control, and throws an exception otherwise. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTextBoxAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_textbox_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTextBoxAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_textbox_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTextBoxAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_textbox_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTextBoxAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_textbox_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoCompleteType AutoCompleteType { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoCompleteType AutoCompleteType
Public Overridable Property AutoCompleteType As AutoCompleteType

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::AutoCompleteType AutoCompleteType { System::Web::UI::WebControls::AutoCompleteType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::AutoCompleteType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件的 AutoComplete 行为

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the AutoComplete behavior of the control

value.span: 枚举值之一，指示 控件的 AutoComplete 行为。

span.span: One of the enumeration values, indicating the AutoComplete behavior for the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要帮助进行数据输入，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 和更高版本以及某些其他浏览器支持称为记忆式键入功能。To assist with data entry, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 and later and some other browsers support a feature referred to as AutoComplete. 记忆式键入功能监视文本框中，并创建的用户输入的值列表。AutoComplete monitors a text box and creates a list of values entered by the user. 当用户在更高版本时，返回到文本框中时，将显示列表。When the user returns to the text box at a later time, the list is displayed. 而不是重新键入以前输入的值，用户可以只需从此列表中选择值。Instead of retyping a previously entered value, the user can simply select the value from this list. 使用属性控制的记忆式键入功能的行为控件。Use the property to control the behavior of the AutoComplete feature for a control. 枚举用于表示的值，可以将应用于属性。The enumeration is used to represent the values that you can apply to the property. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有浏览器支持记忆式键入功能。Not all browsers support the AutoComplete feature. 请与你的浏览器来确定兼容性。Check with your browser to determine compatibility. 默认情况下，属性控件设置为`AutoCompleteType.None`。By default, the property for a control is set to `AutoCompleteType.None`. 使用此设置，控件与其他共享列表控制具有相同跨不同的页的属性。With this setting, the control shares the list with other controls with the same property across different pages. 你还可以共享之间列表控件基于一种类别，而不是属性。You can also share a list between controls based on a category, instead of an property. 当你将设置属性设成一个类别值 (如`AutoCompleteType.FirstName`， `AutoCompleteType.LastName`，依次类推)，则所有具有相同类别的控件共享相同的列表。When you set the property to one of the category values (such as `AutoCompleteType.FirstName`, `AutoCompleteType.LastName`, and so on), all controls with the same category share the same list. 你可以禁用自动完成功能通过设置属性`AutoCompleteType.Disabled`。You can disable the AutoComplete feature for a control by setting the property to `AutoCompleteType.Disabled`. 请参阅浏览器文档有关配置和启用记忆式键入功能的详细信息。Refer to your browser documentation for details on configuring and enabling the AutoComplete feature. 例如，若要启用自动完成功能在 Internet Explorer 5 或更高版本中的，选择**Internet 选项**从**工具**菜单，然后再选择**内容**选项卡。单击**记忆式键入功能**按钮以查看和修改用于记忆式键入功能的各种浏览器选项。For example, to enable the AutoComplete feature in Internet Explorer version 5 or later, select **Internet Options** from the **Tools** menu, and then select the **Content** tab. Click the **AutoComplete** button to view and modify the various browser options for the AutoComplete feature. 有关在 Internet Explorer 中记忆式键入功能的详细信息，请参阅[HTML 窗体中使用自动完成](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163828)中[MSDN 库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about the AutoComplete feature in Internet Explorer, see [Using AutoComplete in HTML Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163828) in the [MSDN Library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举来指定的自动完成类别控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to specify the AutoComplete category for a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[AutoCompleteType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoCompleteType/CS/AutoCompleteTypecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AutoCompleteType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AutoCompleteType/VB/AutoCompleteTypevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 所选的值不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool AutoPostBack { get; set; }
.property instance bool AutoPostBack
Public Overridable Property AutoPostBack As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoPostBack { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示 控件失去焦点时是否发生自动回发到服务器的操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an automatic postback to the server occurs when the control loses focus.

value.span: 如果 控件失去焦点时发生自动回发，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an automatic postback occurs when the control loses focus; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否将发生自动回发到服务器时控件失去焦点。Use the property to specify whether an automatic postback to the server will occur when the control loses focus. 按 ENTER 键或 TAB 键时在控件是将焦点更改的最常见方法。Pressing the ENTER or the TAB key while in the control is the most common way to change focus. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件的父容器包含标记为默认按钮的按钮 (例如，如果容器的或属性设置)，默认按钮`Click`不会在响应中引发事件自动回发。If the control's parent container contains a button marked as the default button (for example, if the container's or property is set), the default button's `Click` event is not raised in response to the automatic postback. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性自动显示文本框中输入值的总和框时控件失去焦点。The following example shows how to use the property to automatically display the sum of the values entered in the text boxes when the control loses focus. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[TextBoxAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxAutoPostBack/CS/textboxautopostbackcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TextBoxAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxAutoPostBack/VB/textboxautopostbackvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CausesValidation { get; set; }
.property instance bool CausesValidation
Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 控件设置为在回发发生时进行验证，是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is set to validate when a postback occurs.

value.span: 当 控件设置为在回发发生时进行验证，如果执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is set to validate when a postback occurs; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时控件设置回发发生时进行验证。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is set to validate when a postback occurs. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 默认情况下，控件不会导致页验证控件没有焦点时。By default, a control does not cause page validation when the control loses focus. 若要设置控件验证回发发生时，设置属性`true`和属性`true`。To set the control to validate when a postback occurs, set the property to `true` and the property to `true`. 时的值属性设置为`true`，你还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件进行验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int Columns { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Columns
Public Overridable Property Columns As Integer
public: virtual property int Columns { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置文本框的显示宽度（以字符为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the display width of the text box in characters.

value.span: 文本框的显示宽度（以字符为单位）。

span.span: The display width, in characters, of the text box.

value.span: 默认值为 0，表示未设置该属性。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指定为 2 个字符的宽度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a width of 2 characters for the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查是否的回发数据控件不同于以前的值，如果是这样，加载内容，并返回`true`。The method checks whether the postback data of the control is different from its previous value and, if so, loads the content and returns `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置文本框中最多允许的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters allowed in the text box.

value.span: 文本框中最多允许的字符数。

span.span: The maximum number of characters allowed in the text box.

value.span: 默认值为 0，表示未设置该属性。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性可限制可输入的字符数控件。Use the property to limit the number of characters that can be entered in the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是适用时，才属性设置为`TextBoxMode.SingleLine`或`TextBoxMode.Password`。This property is applicable only when the property is set to `TextBoxMode.SingleLine` or `TextBoxMode.Password`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192423). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来获取用户输入。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. 当用户单击**添加**显示按钮，在文本框中输入的值的总和。When the user clicks the **Add** button, the sum of the values entered in the text boxes is displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="True" %> TextBox Example

TextBox Example

+ =

``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="vb" AutoEventWireup="false" %> TextBox Example

TextBox Example

+ =

```

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便它始终显示在自定义的一个点的边框服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays a one-point border in a custom server control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTextBoxOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxOnPreRender/CS/custom_textbox_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTextBoxOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxOnPreRender/VB/custom_textbox_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTextBoxOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxOnPreRender/CS/custom_textbox_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTextBoxOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxOnPreRender/VB/custom_textbox_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains event information.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使您可以直接处理该事件。

span.span: This allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发往服务器之间的文本框中的内容更改时引发事件。The event is raised when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > A控件必须保持到此事件来正常工作的服务器的发送操作之间的一些值。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 请确保对于此控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便它始终会将标记自定义为已修改的服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always marks a custom server control as having been modified. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTextBoxOnTextChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxOnTextChanged/CS/custom_textbox_ontextchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTextBoxOnTextChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxOnTextChanged/VB/custom_textbox_ontextchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTextBoxOnTextChanged#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxOnTextChanged/CS/custom_textbox_ontextchanged.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTextBoxOnTextChanged#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxOnTextChanged/VB/custom_textbox_ontextchanged.vb#2)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法如果的已发布的数据控制已更改。The method invokes the method if the posted data for the control has changed. 如果属性是`true`，验证组中的控件中设置属性进行验证。If the property is `true`, the controls in the validation group set in the property are validated.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示能否更改 控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents of the control can be changed.

value.span: 如果不能更改 控件的内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the contents of the control cannot be changed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否的内容可以更改控制。Use the property to specify whether the contents of the control can be changed. 此属性设置为`true`将阻止用户输入值或更改的现有值。Setting this property to `true` will prevent users from entering a value or changing the existing value. 请注意，用户控件无法更改此属性; 只有开发人员可以。Note that the user of the control cannot change this property; only the developer can. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值控件替换为属性设置为`true`时产生的回发，但服务器所执行的只读文本框不处理发送到服务器。The value of a control with the property set to `true` is sent to the server when a postback occurs, but the server does no processing for a read-only text box. 这可以防止恶意用户更改是只读的值。This prevents a malicious user from changing a value that is read-only. 值属性均保留在回发之间的视图状态，除非已由服务器端代码修改。The value of the property is preserved in the view state between postbacks unless modified by server-side code. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以防止对中显示的文本的任何更改控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent any changes to the text displayed in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[TextBoxMultiLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxMultiLine/CS/multilinetextboxcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TextBoxMultiLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxMultiLine/VB/multilinetextboxvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置多行文本框中显示的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in a multiline text box.

span.span: The number of rows in a multiline text box.

value.span: 默认值为 0，表示显示两行文本框。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定在多行文本框中显示的行数。Use the property to specify the number of rows displayed in a multiline text box. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是适用时，才属性设置为`TextBoxMode.MultiLine`。This property is applicable only when the property is set to `TextBoxMode.MultiLine`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指定多行的 5 行高度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a height of 5 rows for a multiline control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[TextBoxMultiLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxMultiLine/CS/multilinetextboxcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TextBoxMultiLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxMultiLine/VB/multilinetextboxvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: override System::Object ^ SaveViewState();

summary.span: 对文本框视图状态在页回发到服务器后所做的更改进行保存。

span.span: Saves the changes to the text box view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该对象关联的视图状态，此方法将返回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件的生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control's life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对于 IIS 5.0 和 6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Application Life Cycle Overview for IIS 5.0 and 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f). 保存视图状态，此字符串对象被作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写此方法并修改你的服务器控件的提高效率`ViewState`属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

span.span: if the text box is multiline; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以创建自定义的文本框。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a custom text box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomTextBoxTagKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxTagKey/CS/custom_textbox_tagkeycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomTextBoxTagKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxTagKey/VB/custom_textbox_tagkeyvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomTextBoxTagKey#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxTagKey/CS/custom_textbox_tagkey.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomTextBoxTagKey#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomTextBoxTagKey/VB/custom_textbox_tagkey.vb#2)]

Public Overridable Property Text As String

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text content of the control.

value.span: 在 控件中显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性指定或确定中显示的文本控件。Use the property to specify or determine the text displayed in the control. 若要限制由控件接受的字符数，设置属性。To limit the number of characters accepted by the control, set the property. 如果你想要防止文本被修改，设置属性。If you want to prevent the text from being modified, set the property. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). 文本框中呈现时，此属性的内容已经过 HTML 编码。When the text box is rendered, the contents of this property are HTML-encoded. 例如，如果将此属性设置为"\ 测试\"，浏览器将显示"\ 测试 \< /b >"，不以粗体显示"测试"。For example, if you set this property to "\Test\", the browser will display "\Test\", not "Test" in bold. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来获取用户输入。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. 当用户单击**添加**显示按钮，在文本框中输入的值的总和。When the user clicks the **Add** button, the sum of the values entered in the text boxes is displayed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="True" %> TextBox Example

TextBox Example

+ =

``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="vb" AutoEventWireup="false" %> TextBox Example

TextBox Example

+ =

```

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler TextChanged;
.event class System.EventHandler TextChanged
Public Custom Event TextChanged As EventHandler
public: virtual event EventHandler ^ TextChanged;

summary.span: 当文本框的内容在向服务器的各次发送过程间更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发往服务器之间的文本框中的内容更改时引发事件。The event is raised when the content of the text box changes between posts to the server. 文本更改用户; 如果仅引发该事件如果以编程方式更改的文本，不被引发事件。The event is only raised if the text is changed by the user; the event is not raised if the text is changed programmatically. > [!NOTE] > A控件必须保持到此事件来正常工作的服务器的发送操作之间的一些值。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 请确保对于此控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此事件来响应中的更改控件。The following example shows how you can use this event to respond to changes in the control. 代码将显示的内容（称为 TextBox1） 处于 （称为 Label1） 的标签的文本框中控件的属性时`Text`属性更改。The code displays the contents of the property of a TextBox control (called TextBox1) in a label (called Label1) when the `Text` property is changed. Web 窗体页中的用户输入可以包含潜在恶意客户端脚本。User input in a Web Forms page can include potentially malicious client script. 默认情况下，Web 窗体页验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, the Web Forms page validates that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)。For more information, see [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b). ```vb Protected Sub TextBox1_TextChanged(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles TextBox1.TextChanged Label1.Text = Server.HtmlEncode(TextBox1.Text) End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void TextBox1_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { Label1.Text = Server.HtmlEncode(TextBox1.Text); } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxMode TextMode { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBoxMode TextMode
Public Overridable Property TextMode As TextBoxMode
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::TextBoxMode TextMode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::TextBoxMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::TextBoxMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的行为模式（单行、多行或密码）。

span.span: Gets or sets the behavior mode (such as, single-line, multiline, or password) of the control.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定如何显示控件。Use the property to specify how a control is displayed. 三个常见选项是单线条、 多行或密码文本框。Three common options are single-line, multiline, or password text box. 当控件是在多行模式下，您可以控制通过设置显示的行数属性。When the control is in multiline mode, you can control the number of rows displayed by setting the property. 你还可以指定通过设置指示文本是否换行属性。You can also specify whether the text should wrap by setting the property. 如果控件位于密码模式中，输入控件中的所有字符时，会都屏蔽。If the control is in password mode, all characters entered in the control are masked. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定多行文本框。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a multiline text box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[TextBoxMultiLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxMultiLine/CS/multilinetextboxcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TextBoxMultiLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxMultiLine/VB/multilinetextboxvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的模式不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified mode is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组从其他页上的验证组可以独立进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值与属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Wrap { get; set; }
.property instance bool Wrap

public: virtual property bool Wrap { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示多行文本框内的文本内容是否换行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text content wraps within a multiline text box.

value.span: 如果多行文本框内的文本内容换行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the text content wraps within a multiline text box; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否为多行中显示的文本控件自动在下一行时继续的文本在到达该控件的结尾。Use the property to specify whether the text displayed in a multiline control automatically continues on the next line when the text reaches the end of the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是适用时，才属性设置为`TextBoxMode.MultiLine`。This property is applicable only when the property is set to `TextBoxMode.MultiLine`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中输入的文本换行控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to wrap text entered in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[TextBoxMultiLine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxMultiLine/CS/multilinetextboxcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TextBoxMultiLine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TextBoxMultiLine/VB/multilinetextboxvb.aspx#1)]
